original_text: You are proud that you know God's Law. But you do not obey that Law. As a result, you cause other people to speak against God.
korean_text: 율법을 자랑하는 네가 율법을 범함으로 하나님을 욕되게 하느냐

sentences.original_text: You are proud that you know God's Law.
But you do not obey that Law.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 그 율법을 순종하지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: As a result, you cause other people to speak against God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과로, 당신은 다른 사람들이 하나님을 비방하도록 만듭니다.
